How to properly use the system: 

Yeah, @Chudboy... that's for u as well!

1. install the game

2. run the date check to decrypt the main exe or the update won't work

3. update

4. copy (not overwrite) the two RELOADED files and execut the RELOADED launcher

NOTE: make sure there's no DaemonTools virtual drive active and if it still won't work, uninstall any Visual C++ 2005 x64 Runtime packages, leave only x86 ones and reboot.

Offline game saving works through the LIVE application inside the game... first run it's the welcome text, second run will show you a page full of text with a link in it... that link goes to a setup that will allow creation of local live profiles so offline game saving.

This game works perfectly on my computer with OS Windows 7 64-Bit

[Hints For Offline User]

[Note]
In windows vista and 7, the savegame is located in C:\Users\[YOURUSERNAME]\AppData\Local\Rockstar Games\GTA IV\savegames\

For Windows Xp, I am not sure where it is but try one of the following:

C:\Documents and Settings\[YOURUSERNAME]\Local Settings\Application Data\Rockstar Games\GTA IV\savegames\

or

C:\Documents and Settings\[YOURUSERNAME]\Application Data\Rockstar Games\GTA IV\savegames\


[Quote]
If you have reinstall or change (not upgrade) your OS and have backup your savegame, I would recommend you to install xliveless or xlive wrapper to continue playing the game. It is only a file called xlive.dll that is added in the game directory.

Don't try to download the official xliveless because running the game will result with an error(Which means that your game is a pirated version). I searched for a cracked xliveless file and fail to do so.

But i remember that a file xlive.dll exists in the police mods of GTA IV (Niko Bellic). So i install the police mod in any location, copy xlive.dll to the EFLC directory and uninstall the police mod(for bug reason).


[Downloads]
Search for Police Pursuit Mod 7.4 or go to link (if alive):

http://www.gtagaming.com/downloads/gta-iv/script-mods/5265

and download the PolicePursuitModBeta7.4b.zip


[Restoration]
My operation works fine but your savegame will have to be restored in the directory  "\Rockstar Games\GTA IV\savegames\" located in Documents" or "My Documents" instead.
